title: Conferences Importer
body_html:
Step 1 in New Conferences functionality
closes #762 : "Import a longlist of conferences"

  • Would it be better to instantiate the Conferences::Importer?
    Answer: I decided not to, because there is no state left after the import has finished.
    Furthermore, but I am not sure about this one: handling the @tempfile that is created by ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile on import, seems to make things overly complicated with an instantiated importer.

Purpose

Showing the students a long list of conferences.
(Managing the conferences is done by the orga's in a Google Spreadsheet.)

What's new?

Orga has a Google Spreadsheet, exports to .csv, and uploads the file in the Teams App
The new Conferences::Importer processes the file
The importer uses a gid ('Google ID' LOL ) to reference the conference, and to decide on updating an existing conference or creating a new one.
The imports file is a long list of conferences, so not all the details are known upfront. Some have unknown dates; that's why I removed the presence-validations on the dates.
The 'old' way of adding and editing the conferences is removed.

ToDo's:

  • More specs. Under construction.
  • Cleaning up the views
  • Before merging: Remove csv content from spec file

Step 1 in New Conferences functionality
closes #762 : "Import a longlist of conferences"

- [x]  Would it be better to instantiate the `Conferences::Importer`?
Answer: I decided not to, because there is no state left after the import has finished. 
Furthermore, but I am not sure about this one:  handling the `@tempfile` that is created by `ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile` on import, seems to make things overly complicated with an instantiated importer.

### Purpose
Showing the students a long list of conferences. 
(Managing the conferences is done by the orga's in a Google Spreadsheet.)  

### What's new?
Orga has a Google Spreadsheet, exports to .csv, and uploads the file in the Teams App
The new `Conferences::Importer` processes the file
The importer uses a `gid` ('Google ID' LOL ) to reference the conference, and to decide on updating an existing conference or creating a new one. 
The imports file is a long list of conferences, so not all the details are known upfront. Some have unknown dates; that's why I removed the presence-validations on the dates. 
The 'old' way of adding and editing the conferences is removed.

- [x] Cleaning up the views 
- [x] Before merging: Remove csv content from spec file
